moves.2. Nf3 a6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4:
trade
I also thought it might give the knight more centre control
moves.9... Qxg5 10. Qxd6 Qxg2 11. O-O-O Nc6 12: I would have gone for qe3
moves.16. Rxd8#:
mate

Can you believe it? I beat the oldest kid!
Apparently he was never as good as the other kids his age.
But its nice to know I can beat a 14 year old.

What did you think? I think I played better than any of my other annotated games
Thanks for viewing
